Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli are set to return to the T20I side after a year.
Afghanistan aims to continue their winning momentum while India prepares to field a strong lineup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the IS Bindra Stadium in Mohali at 7 pm IST.
Fans can watch the live stream on the JioCinema app and can also catch it on Sports 18 and Colors Cineplex.
